participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and driven, always looking for new sounds to incorporate into music.
participant_1.background: i listen to rap music. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza. i produce music for artists.

participant_2.name: Ashley
participant_2.personality: Fun and energetic, with a passion for dance and nostalgic memories.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.
